infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: EmoMate needs access to your camera to enable video conversations with your AI companion and analyze your emotional expressions for a personalized experience.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: EmoMate needs access to your microphone to record your voice for speech recognition and enable audio conversations with your AI companion.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: EmoMate uses speech recognition to convert your spoken words into text for better communication with your AI companion.
